general.gigTitle: design, redesign, build, revamp wordpress website, ecommerce website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Transforming Ideas into High Impact, User Friendly Web Solutions
sellerCard.description:
Hi, I’m Abid Hasan, a highly skilled Web Developer with over 5 years of experience in creating high-performance, user-centric websites. Leading a team of expert developers, we specialize in Custom Full-Stack Development, AI Solutions, UI/UX Design, and CMS platforms like WordPress, Shopify, and Wix. Our team ensures that all websites are SEO-optimized, enhancing both visibility and performance. 
Whether you're looking for a responsive business site, an e-commerce platform, or a fully customized web application, we’re here to bring your vision to life with quality, precision, and innovation.

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional WordPress developer to build, redesign, or revamp your website for eCommerce or business needs? Look no further!


I specialize in designing modern, responsive, and SEO-friendly WordPress websites tailored for eCommerce platforms, business websites, real estate portals, booking systems, and more. Whether you need a fresh start or want to enhance your current site, I deliver solutions to help your business thrive.


Services I Offer:

  • Build, Redesign, or Revamp WordPress Websites for eCommerce and Business Development
  • Fully Responsive Design for Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop
  • Custom Themes Tailored to Your Brand
  • eCommerce Functionality with Secure Payment Gateway Integration
  • Real Estate, Booking Systems, and Amazon Affiliate Sites
  • SEO Optimization for Higher Search Rankings
  • Speed Optimization for Faster Loading
  • Popup Forms, Complex Forms, and Live Chat Integration
  • Migration to New Domain or Hosting


Why Choose Me?

  • ️ 100% Money-Back Guarantee
  • ️ Unlimited revisions until you are satisfied
  • ️ Free 30-day support post-delivery
  • ️ 24/7 communication


Lets create a WordPress website that takes your business to the next level. Place your order today!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for you to start working?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To begin, I’ll need your WordPress login credentials along with any relevant files like images, text, logos, documents, and website references.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How many revisions are included in your service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I provide unlimited revisions to ensure you're completely happy with the final result.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I ensure your site is fully responsive across all devices, including mobile, tablet, desktop, and laptop.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to give you my logo?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, please provide your business logo. If you don’t have one, I can assist you in creating a brand-focused and unique logo.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you turn my Figma, XD, or Sketch design into a WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can convert Figma, XD, and Sketch designs into websites for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you handle SEO and Google Rankings?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer SEO services to boost your site’s visibility. However, I cannot guarantee specific Google rankings due to the dynamic nature of SEO.

reviews.comment:
I did get a website that mostly met my needs, but the process wasn’t super smooth and didn’t feel like I got the best bang for my buck. The developer was quick to respond. 
One of the original job requirements couldn’t be met because I don’t think the developer fully checked the requirements before saying he could do everything without any problems.
 I think his approach would work well for other projects, but it wasn’t the best fit for me.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your feedback. I’m glad the website met most of your needs. I want to clarify that all requirements were fulfilled on my end. The issue with Stripe was related to your account, not mine. I appreciate your understanding and hope my approach works well for other projects.

reviews.comment: Detailed-mind and also bb work professional 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much. Wish to work with you more in future projects.

reviews.comment: He did such amazing job, I want to add instagram feed look like the references I want and he made it👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
Very good understanding of what i needed and went above and beyond and delivered what i wanted! Definitly recommend. Had very quick replies!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much. Looking forward to working together again!

reviews.comment: Abid is polite, concise in his work acumen, and has a good sense of humor. He is straightforward to work with. We were super-aligned during the layout and design. I couldn't recommend anyone better and will use him in the future.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you, and I'm glad we were able to align so well. I look forward to our future collaborations!

consultationData.description: I consult on web development, AI solutions, business strategy, and eCommerce platforms. Bring your questions for a focused session. You’ll receive actionable insights and a summary after the call.
